quotes.quote: If you want light to come into your life, you need to stand where it is shining.
Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
Cultivate an optimistic mind, use your imagination, always consider alternatives, and dare to believe that you can make possible what others think is impossible.
If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
When your attitude is positive, you will naturally have more courage to take the next best step toward your goal.
A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
A positive attitude may not solve all our problems but that is the only option we have if we want to get out of problems.
Having a positive attitude isn't wishy washy, it's a concrete and intelligent way to view problems, challenges and obstacles.
In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
Hope is a waking dream.
All of your dreams and desires are within your reach when you have a positive attitude in your toolkit.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.
If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.
A positive attitude turns I can't & I won't, into I have & I will!
When you are joyful, when you say yes to life and have fun and project positivity all around you, you become a sun in the center of every constellation, and people want to be near you.
Decision decides destiny. What God wants you to become is the positive person you decide to become when led by God's spirit.
A positive attitude awakens inner strength, energy, motivation and initiative.
Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
First steps are always the hardest but until they are taken the notion of progress remains only a notion and not an achievement.
Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.
A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.

It does not matter how long you are spending on the earth, how much money you have gathered or how much attention you have received. It is the amount of positive vibration you have radiated in life that matters.
The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potentialâ€¦ these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
You can do everything you can to try to stop bad things from happening to you, but eventually things will happen, so the best prevention is a positive attitude.
An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
A positive attitude points you toward the best and brightest in the world around you, expanding your potential for growth and development in all areas of life.
Chaotic people often have chaotic lives, and I think they create that. But if you try and have an inner peace and a positive attitude, I think you attract that.
